live_updates: Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue. Thank you for your patience. An update will be provided by 18:00 MT.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
58299.summary: Some customers in Red Deer (West Park) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
58299.title: Feb 25 - Red Deer (West Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
